item.title: Short analysis of Clinical Trials data with focus on studies related to Covid-19
item.description: How many clinical trials are related to Covid-19 research vs other conditions? Introduction At the onset of Coronavirus Pandemics the rush to fund research on Covid-19 vaccines and drugs was enormous. The National Institute of Health (NIH) alone, has received almost $4.9 billion to date to fund important COVID-19 research on diagnostic tests, vaccines, and treatments. Over the past 18 months, CIHR distributed more than $236 million to 556 projects in 23 competitions.
